cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you cycle Seraph of the Stage or it attacks, audition for white. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]
Basic landcycling {1}{W} [i]({1}{W}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]

Vigilance
Whenever the final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, you may return a non-Saga card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “{r}{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each counter on permanents you control.
Trample
{G}{G}, Remove ten counters from among permanents you control, and exile Grasp of the Stageless from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of Grasp of the Stageless. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever Prop Custodian becomes the target of a spell or becomes enchanted for the first time each turn, audition for white. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]

Whenever you cast a spell, note its colors.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to X target creatures get +2/+0 and gain menace until end of turn, where X is the number of colors noted with Off-Set Rumormonger.

Create a 3/3 black Demon Horror creature token.
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “{r}{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]

Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Skyward Dreamers unless you remove a counter from a permanent you control.
Whenever Encouraging Bulwark attacks, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that has counters on it or is enchanted.

When Wayward Bloodseeker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. When you do, Wayward Bloodseeker deals damage to any target equal to the number of permanents you control with counters on them.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

{2}{U}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Choose one. Activate only as a sorcery.
• If a lore counter was removed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Minnow’s Accomplice.
• If a +1/+1 counter was removed this way, draw a card.

When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “{r}{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]
You may have Strikebreaker enter the battlefield as a copy of a non-Aura enchantment you control, except it’s a 2/2 Construct Actor creature in addition to its types.

Deathtouch
Whenever Dreadful Gorgon attacks, target attacking creature with lesser power gains deathtouch until end of turn.

When Verdant Curtain Mascot enters the battlefield, choose one —
• You gain 2 life.
• Proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
When Banished Prophet enters the battlefield, you may remove a counter from a permanent you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

Flying
When Unraveller of Mysteries enters the battlefield, mill two cards.

Prowess
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a permanent you control left the battlefield this turn, target creature can’t block this turn.

Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, audition for green. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Warrior Role giving 3/2 and trample. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]

Audition for green, then audition for green. [i](To audition for green, create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a green Role Aura token on a creature you control, which can be 2/3 Scout with vigilance or a 3/2 Warrior with trample.)[/i]

Haste
Whenever Tailor of Terror attacks, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Tailor of Terror.
Whenever Ivory Curtain Producer attacks, if you cast a spell that targeted it this turn or if it’s enchanted, create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token.

Up to two target creature can’t block this turn.
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “{r}{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]

Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “{r}{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]
Whenever Apprehensive ‘Slinger deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Reach
When Cordial Ticketmaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Flying
When Valiant Instructor enters the battlefield, you return up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
When Astute Sceneweaver enters the battlefield, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]

Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Lead Athlete or it becomes enchanted by a Role, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Creatures you control with counters on them gain trample until end of turn.

When Verdant Curtain Naturalist enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Trample
Whenever Crocheted Buddy attacks, if you cast a spell that targeted it this turn or if it’s enchanted, create a colorless 1/1 Construct Actor creature token.

Discard a card, then draw a card.
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “{r}{3}—You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}: Put a lore counter on a Saga you control.
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Proliferate [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
Scry 2, then draw a card.
{2}, {T}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you control an enchantment.

Flash
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brooding Replacement.
Whenever Scathing Critics deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever Crescent Crasher attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.
When Overconfident Batter dies, if you cast a spell that targeted it this turn or if it’s enchanted, you gain 3 life.

When Backstage Broken enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Actor creature token.
Whenever a token you control leaves the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
When Thespian’s Page enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

As long as it’s your turn, Performers of Purpose has first strike.
When Performers of Purpose enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Actor creature token.

When Marionette Phantom enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Draw a card.
• Proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]

Bigroot Valley enters the battlefield tapped.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.special_text:
I — Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
II — Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
III — At the beginning of the next end step, create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is the number of spells you cast this turn.

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Double the number of counters on target creature you control.

cards.rules_text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant, sorcery, or enchantment spell from your graveyard as long as it targets a creature you control.

Trample
You may spend black and green mana as though it were mana of any color.
Whenever Closing-Act Abomination attacks, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of colors of cards in your graveyard. Put up to one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a party counter on Rambunctious Afterparty. Then Rambunctious Afterparty deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of party counters on Rambunctious Afterparty.

Hollow Queen can’t be blocked by tokens.
Whenever Hollow Queen deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may remove a counter from a permanent you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

cards.special_text:
Exile target nonland permanent you don’t control until Waltz on a Nimbus leaves the battlefield.
Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.”
Search your library for a non-Saga enchantment card and reveal it. You may cast that card. Then shuffle.

cards.rules_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put your choice of a +1/+1 counter, a trample counter, or a haste counter on it.

cards.special_text:
Create a token that’s a copy of up to one target Aura you control and attach it to up to one target permanent you control.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each enchanted creature you control. Those creatures gain indestructible and vigilance until end of turn.
​

I — Create four 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature tokens.
II — Each player sacrifices a nontoken creature.
III — Each player loses 3 life.

I — Put a prowess counter on target creature you control. That creature deals 2 damage to each opponent.
II — Scry 3.
III — Until end of turn, if you casting an instant or sorcery spell causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

Create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
For each color, return up to one target creature card of that color from your graveyard to your hand.
​

cards.card_name: The Rejection of the Fair Prince
cards.special_text:
I — Create two 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature tokens.
II — Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
III — Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.card_name: The Tragedy of Fruits and Fanfare
cards.special_text:
Distribute a trample counter, a vigilance counter and a +1/+1 counter among creatures you control.
You may redistribute counters among other permanents you control.

cards.rules_text:
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life.
Whenever a creature dies, you gain 2 life.

Haste
Whenever Abominable Auteur attacks, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If its mana value was 1 or less, it enters tapped and attacking.

When Leads Don’t Die enters the battlefield, mill four cards and you gain 4 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile X cards from your graveyard and sacrifice Leads Don’t Die. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Perfect the Models deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life. You may play an additional land this turn.
{5}{B}{R}{G}, Exile Perfect the Models from your graveyard: Create three 3/3 black Demon Horror creature tokens. They gain haste and indestructible until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create a Treasure token. If that spell’s mana value is 6 or greater, draw a card. If that spell’s mana value is 8 or greater, Main Role Maiden deals 4 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don’t control.

Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, choose one —
• Create a tapped Treasure token.
• Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
• Create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token.

Dulled Ghost can’t be blocked by creatures with less power than toughness.
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. If that permanent was tapped, each opponent discards a card.

Green creatures you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
Red creatures you control have “{1}, {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player.”
White creatures you control have “{2}, {T}: Tap target nonland permanent.”

red green white

cards.rules_text:
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, choose one that hasn’t been chosen this turn.
• Draw a card.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may reveal it. If you do and it’s a nonland card, you may cast a copy of it. If you don’t cast a copy of the card, Brutal Director deals 2 damage to any target. [i](You still pay the costs of the copied card.)[/i]

If an enchanted permanent you control would leave the battlefield, instead destroy one of the Auras attached to it, then that permanent phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don’t exist until its controller’s next turn.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
Create two 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature tokens. 
Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. Whenever one or more of them deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.

You may exile target nonland permanent. If you do, you lose 3 life.
Create a 7/7 white, black, and green Horror Knight creature token with trample and “Whenever this creature is dealt damage, you lose that much life.”

Create a token that’s a copy of a land or planeswalker card exiled with Around the Plane in Three Days.

Over the Moon deals 4 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.
Spells you cast with mana value 4 or greater cost {1} less to cast this turn and can’t be countered.

Exile up to one target creature you control. At the beginning of your next end step, return it to the battlefield.

Enchant land

Lifelink

cards.rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

When Collapsing Frame enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, Sacrifice Collapsing Frame: Draw a card.

When The Grand Plot enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three Saga cards with different names with mana value X or less, exile them, then shuffle.
The Grand Plot has all chapter abilities of cards exiled with it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a lore counter on The Grand Plot. When you do, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw a card.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. Then that player discards a card.

Choose one —
• Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Create three 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature tokens.
Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. It fights target creature you don’t control.
Draw three cards, then discard two cards.
You gain 2 life and draw two cards.

cards.special_text:
Protection from tokens
[+1]: Each player may draw a card. For each opponent that does, you gain 1 life and create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token.
[-2]: Each player sacrifices a creature. Create a token that’s a copy of a creature sacrificed this way.
[-7]: Until end of turn, each creature you control becomes a 6/6 black Horror creature with trample, menace, and lifelink.

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Cacophonous Demon deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, tap that creature. It becomes an enchantment in addition to its other types.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, any number of target creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage equal to that creature’s mana value to a player or planeswalker,  draw a card.

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink
Whenever Jerrold, Fugitive or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, if you cast it, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard with lesser mana value by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost. Exile that card instead of putting it anywhere else as it resolves.

cards.rules_text:

Marva of Endless Inspiration can’t attack or block unless you’ve cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater this turn.

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control by sources with greater mana value.
{2}{W}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct Actor creature token. Put a vigilance counter on it.

Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with Prop Recycling to its owner’s graveyard.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that’s a copy of a card exiled with Prop Recycling.

As Reflective Stalker enters the battlefield, choose a noncreature card name.
When Reflective Stalker enters the battlefield, if it was cast, create a token that’s a copy of it.
Spells your opponents cast with the chosen name cost {2} more to cast.

Creatures you control get -3/-3.
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a soul counter on Remake the Cast.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each soul counter on Remake the Cast.

Prowess, trample
During your turn, each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card’s mana cost plus pay life equal to that card’s mana value.

Double strike, trample
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you put a lore counter on a Saga you control, Douglass, Star of the Show gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Whenever an enchanted creature you control attacks, draw a card.

Audition for white. If you enchant a creature this way, untap it. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Cleric Role giving 2/2 and lifelink. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]

Tap up to three target creatures.

Whenever you cast your second spell during each of your turns, you may activate one of Salome’s loyalty abilities.
[+1]: Draw a card. Untap up to two lands.

When Paul dies, you may discard a card. If you do, return them to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card.
[0]: Until end of turn, Paul becomes a 2/2 Construct creature with prowess. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to them this turn.
[-3]: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
